name: Gregory Quadro Hardcase 30
description: For gear-intensive travellers, this hard-sided case protects your gadgets with its impressive impact strength. It includes features like spherical wheels that roll along quietly and smoothly, and an inner compartment to separate wet from dry, dirty from clean or ski boots from après clothes.Impact-resistant polycarbonate hardshell protects your gear from weather, temperature changes and rough handling.Smooth rolling Quadro 4x4 wheel system has self-cleaning hubs and durable rubber tread that rolls quietly.Light, strong retractable handle has a comfortable, coated grip.Zippered main compartment has easy to grab U-shaped pulls.Accepts your own lock for security..Expansion zipper adds 18L of capacity for overstuffed trips or souvenier buying binges.Expandable ActiveShield compartment features a wipe-clean TPU coating that blocks dirt, moisture and odors to keep clean gear separate from dirty.Mesh pockets and compression straps inside the main compartment keep you organized.
